resources.string: Without the authentication to Twitter or the Text to Speech libraries the application will not start
All mentions from the one clicked will play
Just the mentions clicked will be played
Talk immediately upon arrival of a tweet or display a notification
Speaks to report a new notification
Automatically switches to \"Speak as Pull\" mode when headphones are inserted
Automatically switches to \"Speak as Pull\" mode when music or game is playing
Show a notification when the application is talking
Force the voice to use a different language, by default voice will use the system language
Speakbird is speaking - click to stop

Developed by Lorenzo Braghetto aka monossido

Graphics designed by Federico Bressan
http://studio73inc.com/
Tap on the red icon(s) to fix
A SpeakBird account has been added to the Android account manager
Automatically switches to \"Notification\" mode when silent mode is set
